LanguageData.VME_Alcohol_Demanded.stages.missing_alco: I could use a drink. Something stronger please.
LanguageData.VME_Alcohol_Demanded.stages.no_alcohol.d: I wish I could have a drink of something stronger.
LanguageData.VME_Alcohol_Demanded.stages.needs_alcoho: I need a drink of something stronger.
LanguageData.VME_Alcohol_Demanded.stages.craves_alcoh: I’d kill for a drop of something stronger.
LanguageData.VME_Alcohol_Desired.stages.missing_alcoh: It's been a while since I've had a drink.
LanguageData.VME_Alcohol_Desired.stages.desiring_a_dr: What this colony needs is a bar so we can take a few drinks with our friends after a day of hard work.
LanguageData.VME_Alcohol_Desired.stages.wanting_a_dri: Hard work is fine, but I'd really appreciate relaxing with some strong spirits or a beer.
Hard work is fine, but I'd really appreciate relaxing with some strong spirits or a beer.
Hard work is fine, but I'd really appreciate relaxing with some strong spirits or a beer.
LanguageData.VME_Alcohol_MildAbstinence.stages.consum: I drank a bit of alcohol. Not a big deal, but I feel a bit woozy.
LanguageData.VME_Aurora_Amazing.stages.amazing_aurora: I have a moment's respite from the darkness of the night.
LanguageData.VME_Aurora_Despised.stages.disgusting_au: The blinding lights in the heavens give me a headache.
LanguageData.VME_AutonomousWeapons_Accepted.stages.au: We use automated turrets. They are an incredible boon to our defenses.
LanguageData.VME_AutonomousWeapons_Exalted.stages.aut: We use automated turrets. Automated defenses are key to a proper defense of what is ours.
LanguageData.VME_InstalledProsthetic_OnlyBiological.s: I had to install a non-natural prosthetic. Flesh only should be replaced by flesh.
I have a non-natural body part in me. Flesh only should be replaced by flesh!
LanguageData.VME_Death_Troubling.stages.death_is_trou: I know death is a part of life, but I just HATE being reminded of it.
LanguageData.VME_Defeat_Dishonorable.stages.defeated_: I was defeated in combat, this brings me great dishonor.
LanguageData.VME_SecondDefeat_Dishonorable.stages.def: I was defeated in combat again, my dishonor is immeasurable.
LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Exalted.stages.did_dumb_la: I had to do dumb labor. I am an excellent example of the working class.
LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Liked.stages.did_dumb_labo: I had to do dumb labor. Broke a sweat but it was some honest work.
LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Disliked.stages.did_dumb_l: I had to do dumb labor. So exhausting!
LanguageData.VME_DumbLabor_Horrible.stages.did_dumb_l: I had to do dumb labor. It’s horrible. I don’t want it.
LanguageData.VME_Eclipse_Despised.stages.disgusting_e: Eclipses are so scary! Where did the light go?
LanguageData.VME_Elders_Despised.stages.elder.label: elder
LanguageData.VME_Elders_Despised.stages.youth.label: youth
LanguageData.VME_Elders_Respected.stages.elder.label: elder
LanguageData.VME_Elders_Holy.stages.elder.label: elder
It has been too long since I’ve seen a fire.
LanguageData.VME_Fire_Desired.stages.very_few_fires.d: I miss seeing the open flames.
LanguageData.VME_Fire_Desired.stages.small_fire.label: small fire
LanguageData.VME_Fire_Desired.stages.small_fire.descr: I recently saw a small fire.
LanguageData.VME_Fire_Desired.stages.saw_fire.label: saw fire
LanguageData.VME_Fire_Desired.stages.saw_fire.descrip: I recently saw a burning flame.
I am surrounded by many beautiful flames. This is fine.
LanguageData.VME_Fire_Despised.stages.no_fires_nearby: There are no fires nearby. That's good.
Looking at those fires makes me uneasy.
LanguageData.VME_Fire_Despised.stages.small_fire.desc: I recently saw a small fire. I'd rather see it extinguished.
LanguageData.VME_Fire_Despised.stages.saw_fire.label: saw fire
LanguageData.VME_Fire_Despised.stages.saw_fire.descri: I recently saw a burning flame. It makes me very uncomfortable!
LanguageData.VME_Fire_Despised.stages.blazing_fires.d: I am surrounded by fire! This is horrible!
LanguageData.VME_Firefighting_Abhorrent.stages.exting: I had to extinguish fire. What a violation of the spirits.
LanguageData.VME_Firefighting_Preferred.stages.exting: I extinguished a fire. What an exhilarating experience!
LanguageData.VME_Hospital_Required.stages.need_hospit: We lack a place to help people and should have a dedicated hospital.
LanguageData.VME_Hospital_Required.stages.dirty_hospi: Nous avons un hôpital, mais il est incroyablement sale. Nous ne sommes pas des animaux !
LanguageData.VME_Hospital_Required.stages.spacious_ho: We have a very spacious hospital.
LanguageData.VME_Hospital_Required.stages.huge_hospit: We have a huge, professional hospital!
LanguageData.VME_Hospital_Required.stages.dirty_hospi: Nous avons un hôpital, mais il est incroyablement sale. Nous ne sommes pas des animaux !
LanguageData.VME_Illness_Exalted.stages.sick.label: sick
LanguageData.VME_Illness_Exalted.stages.sick.descript: A holy virus and the godlike bacteria shall breed in my veins.
LanguageData.VME_Illness_Exalted_TooHealthy.stages.wa: What I would give for the illness to bind me in pain once more.
LanguageData.VME_Illness_Preferred.stages.sick.label: sick
LanguageData.VME_Illness_Preferred.stages.sick.descri: I am sick. A perfect excuse to lie down.
LanguageData.VME_AteInsectJellyDirect.stages.ate_inse: I ate some insect jelly. Not bad.
LanguageData.VME_AteInsectJellyDirect_Loved.stages.at: Insect jelly is divine ambrosia, a gift from perfect creatures.
LanguageData.VME_AteInsectMeat_Sacrilegious.stages.at: I ate some insect meat. This is an act of sacrilege, how could I do this?
LanguageData.VME_AteInsectMeatAsIngredient_Sacrilegio: I ate a meal that contained insect meat. This is an act of sacrilege, how could I do this?
LanguageData.VME_Insectoids_Exalted.stages.insectoid_: I have killed an insectoid being, this is a stain on my soul.
LanguageData.VME_Insectoids_Despised.stages.insectoid: I have killed an insectoid being, this is a victory!
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.no_junk.label: no junk
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.no_junk.descri: It has been too long since I’ve seen junk.
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.few_pieces_of_: few pieces of ancient junk (1 nearby)
This area is way too sparse, I miss seeing the junk.
few pieces of ancient junk (2 nearby)
This area has very few relics of ancient technology.
few pieces of ancient junk (3 nearby)
We need to gather more pieces of ancient junk.
few pieces of ancient junk (4 nearby)
We have too few pieces of ancient junk lying around.
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.very_little_ju: We should gather at least a few more pieces. Our junkyard is lacking.
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.small_junk.des: I recently saw a small pile of junk.
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.saw_junk.label: saw junk
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.stages.beautiful_junk: I am surrounded by a junkyard and I love it.
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Preferred.stages.no_junk.label: no junk
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Preferred.stages.no_junk.descri: I'd prefer if the colony had some examples of ancient junk.
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Preferred.stages.few_pieces_of_: few pieces of ancient junk (1 nearby)
This area is way too sparse, we could learn a lot from ancient technology.
few pieces of ancient junk (2 nearby)
This area has very few relics of ancient technology.
few pieces of ancient junk (3 nearby)
We need to gather more pieces of ancient junk.
few pieces of ancient junk (4 nearby)
We have too few pieces of ancient junk lying around.
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Preferred.stages.very_little_ju: We should gather at least a few more pieces. We can learn a lot from ancient technology.
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Preferred.stages.small_junk.des: I recently saw a small pile of junk.
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Preferred.stages.saw_junk.label: saw junk
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Preferred.stages.lots_of_junk.d: I am surrounded by a junkyard. I find these examples of ancient technology to be fascinating.
LanguageData.VME_KillingWithFire_Preferred.stages.ene: Our enemies burnt in the holy flames.
LanguageData.VME_KillingWithFire_Abhorrent.stages.ene: Our enemies burnt to death and we were unable to avoid their gruesome deaths.
LanguageData.VME_LeatherApparel_Abhorrent.stages.wear: I'm wearing clothing made with animal leather. Slaughtering an animal to use its skin as apparel is cruel and inhumane.
LanguageData.VME_LeatherApparel_Disliked.stages.weari: I'm wearing clothing made with animal leather. Slaughtering an animal to use its skin should be avoided.
LanguageData.VME_AteAnimalProducts_Abhorrent.stages.a: I had to eat animal products. It is wrong and immoral to imprison an animal and use it as a factory.
LanguageData.VME_Mechanoids_Exalted.stages.mechanoid_: I have destroyed a mechanoid being, this will anger the gods.
LanguageData.VME_Mechanoids_Despised.stages.mechanoid: I have destroyed a mechanoid being, this is a victory!
LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.stages.stars_ar: The astral architects smile upon me, their benevolence is unmatched.
The stellar bodies above tell a story of imminent fortunes and success.
The stars whisper to me, and they tell me to breathe easy. My fate is comfortably in their hands.
Though small, the constellations tell me all is well for the time being.
The stars whisper nonsense and contradictions, our destiny is increasingly unclear.
The skies do not bode well, an ill omen is on the horizon.
stars are not on my side
The sea of stars is ever cloudy, they shroud themselves from me and refuse to tell me of my fate.
The stellar bodies far above have made themselves clear, I am no longer in their favor.
The planets have aligned, a syzygy has made clear my approaching demise is inescapable. I will shortly be reduced to mere dust.
LanguageData.VME_Mood_Shared.stages.rejoice.label: rejoice
LanguageData.VME_Mood_Shared.stages.rejoice.descripti: Everyone is in good mood, as am I.
LanguageData.VME_Mood_Shared.stages.grieve.label: grieve
LanguageData.VME_Mood_Shared.stages.grieve.descriptio: Everyone is in bad mood, as am I.
LanguageData.VME_Mood_LowExpectations.stages.bad_mood: I'm just generally having a bad mood. The Rim is a hostile place.
LanguageData.VME_Mood_HighExpectations.stages.good_mo: I'm just generally having a good mood. The Rim is an amazing place.
LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Despised.stages.wande: We have been here for too long. Perhaps it is time to leave.
We have been here for too long. Perhaps it is time to leave.
We have been here for too long. Perhaps it is time to leave.
This colony is trite. We should we wandering, not staying on the same place.
This colony is trite. We should we wandering, not staying on the same place.
Enough already! It is time to pack our things and hit the road.
Enough already! It is time to pack our things and hit the road.
Agh! I can't stand being here anymore!
LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Desired.stages.magnif: Our city is magnificent, a fine example of what humanity can achieve.
LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Desired.stages.lots_o: We have so many beautiful buildings!
LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Desired.stages.many_b: We have so many beautiful buildings!
LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Desired.stages.not_en: There are not enough buildings nearby. I feel unprotected.
LanguageData.VME_Power_Exalted.stages.divine_rule.des: My rule is supreme, for I am godlike.
LanguageData.VME_Power_Desired.stages.in_a_position_o: I feel important and everyone looks up to me.
LanguageData.VME_Power_Preferred.stages.i_am_importan: I hold a reasonable position of power and I like that feeling
I participated in a raid. Through conquest, we bring honor to our colony.
LanguageData.VME_RecentConquest_Honorable.stages.rece: We recently raided another faction. Through conquest, we bring honor to our colony.
LanguageData.VME_RecentConquest_Honorable.stages.no_r: It's been far too long since we raided anyone. Through conquest, we bring honor to our colony.
I participated in a raid. How could we do that? It's horribly shameful!
LanguageData.VME_RecentConquest_Abhorrent.stages.rece: We recently raided another faction. This is horrible and brings shame to our colony.
LanguageData.VME_RecentConquest_Abhorrent.stages.no_r: It's been a long since we raided anyone. This is as it should be, we are not bullies.
LanguageData.VME_Ranching_Disliked.stages.no_pen_mark: We have no imprisoned animals. This is the way things should be.
LanguageData.VME_Ranching_Disliked.stages.pen_marker_: We have a pen marker in our colony. Animals are not our slaves and shouldn't be kept captive, it's immoral.
LanguageData.VME_Ranching_Disliked.stages.pen_markers: We have several pen markers in our colony. Animals are not our slaves and shouldn't be kept captive, it's immoral!
LanguageData.VME_Ranching_Disliked.stages.factory_far: Our colony has too many pens, filled with poor animals in cramped conditions, bred for the slaughter. I'm disgusted.
LanguageData.VME_Ranching_Disliked_AttackedAnimal.sta: I had to attack an animal. They have rights too!
I sowed a human food plant. It's amazing, food free from cruelty and abuse.
LanguageData.VME_Recreation_Disapproved.stages.waste_: Recreation is a waste of time.
LanguageData.VME_Scars_Honorable.stages.scarred.label: scarred
LanguageData.VME_Slavery_Forbidden_SlavesInColony.sta: There are slaves in the colony. We should emancipate them as soon as possible.
LanguageData.VME_SoldSlave_Know_Forbidden_Mood.stages: We took part in the horrible act of slave trading. What a disgrace.
LanguageData.VME_BoughtSlave_Know_Forbidden_Mood.stag: We have bought a slave from evil slave traders!
LanguageData.VME_TaintedApparel_Abhorrent.stages.wear: I'm wearing clothing used by a dead person, I can't imagine anything more disgusting! Someone died wearing these!
LanguageData.VME_TatteredApparel_Abhorrent.stages.wea: I'm wearing clothing that is tattered, and this is incredibly disgusting. Only the finest threads are worthy of my body.
LanguageData.VME_Trading_Required.stages.recently_tra: As usual, our products are flying off the shelves.
LanguageData.VME_Trading_Required.stages.no_recent_tr: No one wants to buy our product. I hope these quiet times will pass.
LanguageData.VME_Travel_Desired.stages.traveled_the_w: There is nothing as exhilarating as seeing what the world has to offer.
Travelling is amazing. Seeing the sights, discovering new lands... The memories of my last travels are still fresh in my mind.
It's been a few days since I travelled. I loved it.
I have a fond memory of my past travels.
LanguageData.VME_Travel_Despised.stages.had_to_leave_: I despise travelling. Leaving the security of our colony is terrible.
The memories of my last travels are still fresh in my mind. I hated it.
It's been a few days since I travelled. I hated it.
I have uncomfortable memories of my past travels.
LanguageData.VME_Violence_Honorable.stages.attacked_p: I have used deadly force on an adversary. This proves our strength and our resolve.
LanguageData.VME_Violence_Disapproved.stages.attacked: I have used deadly force on an adversary. This is wrong.
LanguageData.VME_Violence_Abhorrent.stages.attacked_p: I have used deadly force on an adversary. It brings great shame.
LanguageData.VME_AttendedParty.stages.attended_superb: I had a good time at that party.
Someone was executed for the lack of compliance. I need to be positive. I NEED TO.
LanguageData.VME_NeedAnonymity.stages.anonymity_viola: They know everything, I’m an open book, entirely vulnerable and without a shred of nuance.
LanguageData.VME_NeedAnonymity.stages.anonymity_compr: My identity has been deeply compromised, I’m so ashamed by the attention I’ve garnered for myself.
LanguageData.VME_NeedAnonymity.stages.anonymity_threa: This can’t be allowed to continue, if I keep this behavior up I’ll be exposed.
LanguageData.VME_NeedAnonymity.stages.completely_anon: I feel so much more comfortable like this. I don’t even think they know my name or face.
LanguageData.VME_TerribleBonfire.stages.terrible_bonf: Some pathetic little flames drifted around, and they went away too soon. "Bon" fire? More like "Lame" fire.
LanguageData.VME_LacklusterBonfire.stages.lackluster_: We were expecting a wondrous conflagration, and instead we got an oversized campfire. At least it was kinda entertaining.
LanguageData.VME_GoodBonfire.stages.good_bonfire.desc: The flames rose and crackled majestically over the settlement, and it lifted all our spirits considerably.
LanguageData.VME_GloriousBonfire.stages.glorious_bonf: It was super fun and we really connected with each other with the shared experience.
LanguageData.VME_TerribleCeremonialSuicide.stages.ter: That ceremonial suicide was terrible. The blade was thrust laterally and there was blood and entrails everywhere. Disgusting!
LanguageData.VME_BoringCeremonialSuicide.stages.borin: That ceremonial suicide was not good. The speech seemed forced. At the very least we have restored the honor of our colony.
LanguageData.VME_HonorableCeremonialSuicide.stages.ho: A honorable ceremonial suicide. The shadow of defeat no longer clouds our minds.
LanguageData.VME_UnforgettableCeremonialSuicide.stage: That ceremonial suicide was unforgettable! Everyone will remember the courage, self-control, and strong resolve. The honor of our colony is now spotless.
LanguageData.VME_SquamousIncantation.stages.squamous_: An indescribably hideous gibbering! I'd even describe it as squamous, but I don't even know what that is! An unutterable word!
LanguageData.VME_AccursedIncantation.stages.accursed_: A litany of dark morbidities expressed in crime, perversion, and insanity.
LanguageData.VME_BlasphemousIncantation.stages.blasph: A promise of hidden and fathomless worlds of strange life which pulsate in the gulfs beyond the stars and press hideously upon our own globe in unholy dimensions which only the dead and the moonstruck can glimpse.
LanguageData.VME_LoathsomeIncantation.stages.loathsom: We live on a placid island of ignorance in the midst of black seas of infinity, and it was not meant that we should voyage far.
LanguageData.VME_UninterestingInsectoidHymn.stages.un: What an incredibly uninteresting ritual. Yeah, yeah, insects are cool. Bah.
LanguageData.VME_AwkwardInsectoidHymn.stages.awkward_: The speech was repetitive, and it did nothing to convince me of the divinity of our beloved insects.
LanguageData.VME_RousingInsectoidHymn.stages.rousing_: The chanter showed impressing skill and the hymn appropriately extolled the virtues of our way of life.
LanguageData.VME_EntrancingInsectoidHymn.stages.entra: I can still hear the mesmerizing words of the hymn, like a myriad insectile legs crawling all over our bodies.
LanguageData.VME_TerribleLeadershipChallenge.stages.t: That leadership challenge was terrible. Watching it just made people sad. I guess we have a strong leader, at least...
LanguageData.VME_BoringLeadershipChallenge.stages.bor: That leadership challenge was not good. The fighters wouldn't commit, so there were no exciting moments. At least our leader is the strongest.
LanguageData.VME_GoodLeadershipChallenge.stages.good_: A good leadership challenge. The fighters went for blood and showed real heart. We now know that our leader is the strongest.
LanguageData.VME_UnforgettableLeadershipChallenge.sta: That leadership challenge was unforgettable! Both fighters gave all they had, and we know that our leader is now the strongest among us!
When you think of an orgy, you tend to imagine attractive people. This was... the entire opposite. The mental images will take a while to go away.
LanguageData.VME_AwkwardOrgy.stages.awkward_orgy.desc: Everyone sat around not knowing exactly what to do, naked bodies laying everywhere. Quite disappointing.
LanguageData.VME_SexyOrgy.stages.sexy_orgy.label: sexy orgy
LanguageData.VME_SexyOrgy.stages.sexy_orgy.descriptio: We gave ourselves to each other in a communal expression of our deepest passions.
LanguageData.VME_ExhilaratingOrgy.stages.exhilarating: We all donned our high-society masquerade masks and got naked. A barrage of orgasmic sexual ecstasy unlike no other made our bodies tremble with barely concealed excitement.
LanguageData.VME_GotSomeLovin.stages.got_some_lovin.d: There's nothing like a tumble between the sheets to lift the mood.
LanguageData.VME_TerriblePlagueFestival.stages.terrib: That plague festival was botched and the mood was way off. The corpse laid there, inert, and no holy miasma was liberated from it. What a waste of time!
LanguageData.VME_BoringPlagueFestival.stages.boring_p: That plague festival was repetitive and the killing technique was noticeably flawed. However the blessed plague is now among us.
LanguageData.VME_SatisfyingPlagueFestival.stages.sati: That plague festival was satisfying and a holy miasma was liberated from the corpse, bathing us all in a sacred plague wind.
LanguageData.VME_SpectacularPlagueFestival.stages.spe: The blood! The release! That plague festival brought everyone to the edge of a frenzy and a sacred plague wind wafted from the animal's corpse, blessing us.
LanguageData.VME_DemagogicSlaveEmancipation.stages.de: We ended up looking as the evil guys here... With such a display, it's unlikely anyone will freely want to join the colony.
LanguageData.VME_FreethinkingSlaveEmancipation.stages: Our leader's speech was clear and succint, explaining all the evils of slavery in a concise way.
Our leader's speech was very inspiring, detailing all the evils caused by slavery and the immense advantages of a free society.
LanguageData.VME_LiberatingSlaveEmancipation.stages.l: Our leader's speech was a masterclass in extolling the virtues of a free society, liberated for the shackles of slavery.
LanguageData.VME_AmazingSlaveEmancipation.stages.amaz: Legends will be told about our leader's speech, and how those words will resonate in the future, elevating the cause of emancipation.
LanguageData.VME_PoorlyOrganizedTradingFair.stages.po: With such a low quality effort, no additional caravans will be attracted to our settlement...
LanguageData.VME_UnexcitingTradingFair.stages.unexcit: Some exciting transactions took place, but the majority of it was boring business talk.
LanguageData.VME_WellOrganizedTradingFair.stages.well: There was a lot of back and forth and networking.
LanguageData.VME_WondrousTradingFair.stages.wondrous_: We discussed exciting and innovative economical paradigms, and our settlement will be renowned as a center of finance learning.
LanguageData.VME_CheapTradingFair.stages.we_tried_to_: We tried to organize a trading fair without spending any money on it. It is shameful to be so cheap.
LanguageData.VME_AwkwardViolentConversion.stages.awkw: That violent conversion was awkward. The words were vague and unconvincing.
LanguageData.VME_SatisfyingViolentConversion.stages.s: That violent conversion was satisfying. The speech was stirring and enjoyable to listen to.
That violent conversion was electrifying! Surely our beliefs will prevail over any others!
LanguageData.VME_TerribleWickerManBurning.stages.terr: The whole ritual smelled like rotten bacon. And, inexplicably the prisoner kept shouting "No! Not the bees!". What was that all about?
LanguageData.VME_LacklusterWickerManBurning.stages.la: The prisoner just burned to death too fast, and the fire didn't even lift our spirits much.
LanguageData.VME_GoodWickerManBurning.stages.good_wic: The anguished cries of the prisoner will resonate with us for a long time, another soul consumed by the flames.
LanguageData.VME_GloriousWickerManBurning.stages.glor: We will forever remember the thrashing of the prisoner, the frightened crescendo of screams as another soul was consumed by the holy flames.
